wikipedia_page.main: John Macey (born 13 November 1947) is an English former professional footballer. A goalkeeper, Macey joined Newport County from Grimsby Town in 1970. He made 194 appearances for Newport before joining Minehead in 1976.After retiring from playing he set up a successful sports accessories outlet in Newport.

response: * John Macey (born 1947), English former football goalkeeper
